data.eml:eml: New species and a new record of sea cucumbers from deep waters of the South African temperate region (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thandar, Ahmed S. (2009): New species and a new record of sea cucumbers from deep waters of the South African temperate region (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea). Zootaxa 2013: 30-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185850
